p: We also evaluated the effect of T. capitatus EO on DV CAP and τ rep parameters in order to assess for alterations in the depolarization and/or repolarization phases of CAP recordings. Taken together, our results showed that T. capitatus EO (100 μg/mL) decreased DV CAP from 48.4 ± 7.6 V/s (control) to 18.1 ± 9.1 V/s ( p < 0.05) after 30 min of incubation. Such effect was reversed to 26.1 ± 10.2 V/s after drug washout ( Figure 3(A)). Meanwhile, no differences were observed on the CAP repolarization phase, measured by τ rep ( Figure 3(B)).
